trans-unit.source: Represents the Saudi Hijri (Um Al Qura) calendar.
trans-unit.target: 表示沙特阿拉伯 (Um Al Qura) 回历。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar> class is nearly identical to the <xref:System.Globalization.HijriCalendar> class, except the Um Al Qura calendar uses a table-based algorithm licensed from the Saudi government to calculate dates, can express dates to the year 1500 A.H., and does not support the <xref:System.Globalization.HijriCalendar.HijriAdjustment%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar>类在几乎等同于<xref:System.Globalization.HijriCalendar>类中，但古兰经历使用与沙特阿拉伯政府授权基于表的算法来计算日期，可以快速日期为 1500 年纪元，也不支持<xref:System.Globalization.HijriCalendar.HijriAdjustment%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: For information about using the <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar> class and the other calendar classes in the .NET Framework, see [Working with Calendars](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关使用信息<xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar>类和其他日历.NET Framework 中的类，请参阅[使用日历](~/docs/standard/datetime/working-with-calendars.md)。

trans-unit.source: For the <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar> class, each month has either 29 or 30 days, but usually in no discernible order.
trans-unit.target: 有关<xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar>类，每个月有 29 或 30 天，但通常不会造成明显的顺序。

trans-unit.source: Whereas the documentation for the Hijri Calendar gives a table that shows the corresponding days in each month, no such general table can be produced for the Um Al Qura calendar.
trans-unit.target: 而在伊斯兰日历的文档提供一个表来显示每个月内的相应的天数，可以为古兰经历生成没有此类常规的表。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the Hijri calendar, see the <xref:System.Globalization.HijriCalendar> class.
trans-unit.target: 有关在伊斯兰日历的详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Globalization.HijriCalendar>类。

trans-unit.source: **Note** The <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar> class supports only dates from 04/30/1900 00.00.00 (Gregorian date) through 11/16/2077 23:59:59 (Gregorian date).
trans-unit.target: **请注意**<xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar>类支持仅日期从 04/30/1900 年 00.00.00 （公历日期） 到 11/16/2077 23:59:59 （公历日期）。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: The date to which to add months.
trans-unit.target: 要加上月数的日期。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar" /> class supports only dates from 04/30/1900 00.00.00 (Gregorian date) through 11/16/2077 23:59:59 (Gregorian date).
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar" /> 类仅支持从 04/30/1900 00.00.00（公历日期）到 11/16/2077 23:59:59（公历日期）的日期。

trans-unit.source: The positive or negative number of months to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的正月数或负月数。

trans-unit.source: Calculates a date that is a specified number of months away from a specified initial date.
trans-unit.target: 计算与指定初始日期相距指定月数的日期。

trans-unit.source: The date yielded by adding the number of months specified by the <paramref name="months" /> parameter to the date specified by the <paramref name="time" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在将 <paramref name="months" /> 参数指定的月数加到 <paramref name="time" /> 参数指定的日期后所得的日期。

trans-unit.source: The day part of the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year.
trans-unit.target: 日部分的生成<xref:System.DateTime>如果结果的日期不是有效的一天中生成月份影响。

trans-unit.source: It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year.
trans-unit.target: 它将更改为在生成每年的生成的每月最后一个有效的一天。

trans-unit.source: The year part of the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> is affected if the resulting month is outside the year of the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 所生成的年份部分<xref:System.DateTime>如果外部的指定年，则结果月份受到<xref:System.DateTime>。

trans-unit.source: This implementation supports only the current era.
trans-unit.target: 此实现支持仅当前纪元。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, an exception is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果结果年份外部指定纪元，则引发异常<xref:System.DateTime>。

trans-unit.source: The time-of-day part of the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> remains the same as the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 所生成的一天时间部分<xref:System.DateTime>保持与指定相同<xref:System.DateTime>。

trans-unit.source: For example, if the specified month is Zulkadah, which has 30 days, the specified day is the 30th day of that month, and the value of the `months` parameter is 3, the resulting year is one more than the specified year, the resulting month is Safar, and the resulting day is the 29th day, which is the last day in Safar.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果指定的月份是 Zulkadah，包含 30 天，指定的日期是该月 30 日和的值`months`参数为 3，则生成的年份是一个多个指定的年份，生成的月份是日和生成 d在为 29 日，即 Safar 的最后一天。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the `months` parameter is negative, the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> is earlier than the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 如果值`months`参数是负数，生成<xref:System.DateTime>早于指定<xref:System.DateTime>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.DateTime> value always equals <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性返回<xref:System.DateTime>值始终等于<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: You can preserve the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the `time` parameter by calling the <xref:System.DateTime.SpecifyKind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, as the following example shows.
trans-unit.target: 您可以保留<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性`time`通过调用的参数<xref:System.DateTime.SpecifyKind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，如以下示例所示。

trans-unit.source: The following example instantiates a <xref:System.DateTime> value and displays the values of several of its components in the Um Al Qura calendar.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例实例化<xref:System.DateTime>值和在古兰经历显示的多个及其组件的值。

trans-unit.source: Next, it calls the <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.AddYears%2A> and <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.AddMonths%2A> methods to add 2 years and 10 months in the Um Al Qura calendar to the date value.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，它调用<xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.AddYears%2A>和<xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.AddMonths%2A>方法以将古兰经历 2 年 10 月添加到的日期值。

trans-unit.source: Finally, it again displays the values of these date components in the Um Al Qura calendar.
trans-unit.target: 最后，它再次显示这些日期组件的值中古兰经历。

trans-unit.source: The resulting date is outside the range supported by the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 得到的日期不在 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar" /> 类支持的范围内。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="months" /> is less than -120,000 or greater than 120,000.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="months" /> 小于 -120,000 或大于 120,000。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="time" /> is outside the range supported by this calendar.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="time" /> 超出了此日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: The date to which to add years.
trans-unit.target: 要加上年数的日期。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar" /> class supports only dates from 04/30/1900 00.00.00 (Gregorian date) through 11/16/2077 23:59:59 (Gregorian date).
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar" /> 类仅支持从 04/30/1900 00.00.00（公历日期）到 11/16/2077 23:59:59（公历日期）的日期。

trans-unit.source: The positive or negative number of years to add.
trans-unit.target: 要添加的正年数或负年数。

trans-unit.source: Calculates a date that is a specified number of years away from a specified initial date.
trans-unit.target: 计算与指定初始日期相距指定年数的日期。

trans-unit.source: The date yielded by adding the number of years specified by the <paramref name="years" /> parameter to the date specified by the <paramref name="time" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 在将 <paramref name="years" /> 参数指定的年数加到 <paramref name="time" /> 参数指定的日期后所得的日期。

trans-unit.source: The day part of the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> is affected if the resulting day is not a valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year.
trans-unit.target: 日部分的生成<xref:System.DateTime>如果结果的日期不是有效的一天中生成月份影响。

trans-unit.source: It is changed to the last valid day in the resulting month of the resulting year.
trans-unit.target: 它将更改为在生成每年的生成的每月最后一个有效的一天。

trans-unit.source: The month part of the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> remains the same as the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 所生成的月份部分<xref:System.DateTime>保持与指定相同<xref:System.DateTime>。

trans-unit.source: This implementation supports only the current era.
trans-unit.target: 此实现支持仅当前纪元。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, an exception is thrown if the resulting year is outside the era of the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 因此，如果结果年份外部指定纪元，则引发异常<xref:System.DateTime>。

trans-unit.source: The time-of-day part of the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> remains the same as the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 所生成的一天时间部分<xref:System.DateTime>保持与指定相同<xref:System.DateTime>。

trans-unit.source: For example, Zulhijjah has 29 days, except during leap years when it has 30 days.
trans-unit.target: 例如，闰年有 29 天，但在闰年时它有 30 天。

trans-unit.source: If the specified date is the 30th day of Zulhijjah in a leap year and the value of the `years` parameter is 1, the resulting date is the 29th day of Zulhijjah in the following year.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的日期是闰年中闰年的 30 天并且的值`years`参数是 1，则得到的日期是在下一年中的闰年 29 日。

trans-unit.source: If `years` is negative, the resulting <xref:System.DateTime> is earlier than the specified <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`years`为负，生成<xref:System.DateTime>早于指定<xref:System.DateTime>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.DateTime> value always equals <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性返回<xref:System.DateTime>值始终等于<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: You can preserve the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the `time` parameter by calling the <xref:System.DateTime.SpecifyKind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method, as the following example shows.
trans-unit.target: 您可以保留<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性`time`通过调用的参数<xref:System.DateTime.SpecifyKind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，如以下示例所示。

trans-unit.source: The following example instantiates a <xref:System.DateTime> value and displays the values of several of its components in the Um AL Qura calendar.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例实例化<xref:System.DateTime>值和在古兰经历显示的多个及其组件的值。

trans-unit.source: Next, it calls the <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.AddYears%2A> and <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.AddMonths%2A> methods to add 2 years and 10 months in the Um Al Qura calendar to the date value.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，它调用<xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.AddYears%2A>和<xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.AddMonths%2A>方法以将古兰经历 2 年 10 月添加到的日期值。

trans-unit.source: Finally, it again displays the values of these date components in the Um Al Qura calendar.
trans-unit.target: 最后，它再次显示这些日期组件的值中古兰经历。

trans-unit.source: The resulting date is outside the range supported by the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 得到的日期不在 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar" /> 类支持的范围内。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="years" /> is less than -10,000 or greater than 10,000.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="years" /> 小于 -10,000 或大于 10,000。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="time" /> is outside the range supported by this calendar.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="time" /> 超出了此日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current calendar is solar-based, lunar-based, or a combination of both.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示当前日历是阳历、阴历还是二者的组合。

trans-unit.source: Always returns <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CalendarAlgorithmType.LunarCalendar" />.
trans-unit.target: 始终返回 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.CalendarAlgorithmType.LunarCalendar" />。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses reflection to instantiate each <xref:System.Globalization.Calendar> type found in the .NET Framework and displays the value of its <xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.AlgorithmType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用反射来实例化每个<xref:System.Globalization.Calendar>类型在.NET Framework 中找到并显示的值其<xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.AlgorithmType%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of days in the year that precedes the year that is specified by the <see cref="P:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.MinSupportedDateTime" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="P:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.MinSupportedDateTime" /> 属性指定的年份之前的年中天数。

trans-unit.source: The number of days in the year that precedes the year specified by <see cref="P:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.MinSupportedDateTime" />.
trans-unit.target: 由 <see cref="P:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.MinSupportedDateTime" /> 指定的在年之前的一年的天数。

trans-unit.source: This property returns a constant value of 384.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回 384 的常量值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a list of the eras that are supported by the current <see cref="T:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar" /> 支持的纪元的列表。

trans-unit.source: An array that consists of a single element having a value that is <see cref="F:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.UmAlQuraEra" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个数组，它由值为 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.UmAlQuraEra" /> 的单个元素组成。

trans-unit.source: The Hijri calendar recognizes one era: A.H.
trans-unit.target: 在伊斯兰日历识别一个纪元： 纪元

trans-unit.source: (Latin "Anno Hegirae", which means "the year of the migration," in reference to the migration of Muhammad (PBUH) from Mecca).
trans-unit.target: (拉丁"Anno Hegirae"，这意味着"year 的迁移后，"关于迁移的穆罕默德 (PBUH) 从麦加迁)。

trans-unit.source: This property always returns an array with only one element.
trans-unit.target: 此属性始终返回包含仅有一个元素的数组。

trans-unit.source: The date value to read.
trans-unit.target: 要读取的日期值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar" /> class supports only dates from 04/30/1900 00.00.00 (Gregorian date) through 11/16/2077 23:59:59 (Gregorian date).
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar" /> 类仅支持从 04/30/1900 00.00.00（公历日期）到 11/16/2077 23:59:59（公历日期）的日期。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the day of the month on which a specified date occurs.
trans-unit.target: 计算指定日期出现在月中的哪一天。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 through 30 that represents the day of the month specified by the <paramref name="time" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 一个从 1 到 30 的整数，表示由 <paramref name="time" /> 参数指定的月中日期。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays the values of several components of a <xref:System.DateTime> in terms of the Um Al Qura calendar.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例显示几个组成部分的值<xref:System.DateTime>方面古兰经历。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="time" /> is outside the range supported by this calendar.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="time" /> 超出了此日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: The date value to read.
trans-unit.target: 要读取的日期值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar" /> class supports only dates from 04/30/1900 00.00.00 (Gregorian date) through 11/16/2077 23:59:59 (Gregorian date).
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar" /> 类仅支持从 04/30/1900 00.00.00（公历日期）到 11/16/2077 23:59:59（公历日期）的日期。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the day of the week on which a specified date occurs.
trans-unit.target: 计算指定日期出现在星期几。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DayOfWeek" /> value that represents the day of the week specified by the <paramref name="time" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.DayOfWeek" /> 值，表示 <paramref name="time" /> 参数指定的日期是星期几。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DayOfWeek> values are as follows:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DayOfWeek>值如下：

trans-unit.source: DayOfWeek value
trans-unit.target: DayOfWeek 值

trans-unit.source: which indicates
trans-unit.target: 指示

trans-unit.source: Sunday
trans-unit.target: 星期日

trans-unit.source: الاحد (Al-Ahad)
trans-unit.target: الاحد (Al Ahad)

trans-unit.source: Monday
trans-unit.target: 星期一

trans-unit.source: الاثنين (Al-Ithnayn)
trans-unit.target: الاثنين (Al Ithnayn)

trans-unit.source: Tuesday
trans-unit.target: 星期二

trans-unit.source: الثلاثاء (At-Thulaathaa')
trans-unit.target: الثلاثاء (在 Thulaathaa)

trans-unit.source: Wednesday
trans-unit.target: 星期三

trans-unit.source: الاربعاء (Al-Arbi'aa')
trans-unit.target: الاربعاء (Al Arbi'aa)

trans-unit.source: Thursday
trans-unit.target: 星期四

trans-unit.source: الخميس (Al-Khamiis)
trans-unit.target: الخميس (Al Khamiis)

trans-unit.source: Friday
trans-unit.target: 星期五

trans-unit.source: الجمعة (Al-Jumu'ah)
trans-unit.target: الجمعة (Al Jumu'ah)

trans-unit.source: Saturday
trans-unit.target: 星期六

trans-unit.source: السبت (As-Sabt)
trans-unit.target: السبت (作为 Sabt)

trans-unit.source: The following example displays the values of several components of a <xref:System.DateTime> in terms of the Um Al Qura calendar.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例显示几个组成部分的值<xref:System.DateTime>方面古兰经历。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="time" /> is outside the range supported by this calendar.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="time" /> 超出了此日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: The date value to read.
trans-unit.target: 要读取的日期值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar" /> class supports only dates from 04/30/1900 00.00.00 (Gregorian date) through 11/16/2077 23:59:59 (Gregorian date).
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar" /> 类仅支持从 04/30/1900 00.00.00（公历日期）到 11/16/2077 23:59:59（公历日期）的日期。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the day of the year on which a specified date occurs.
trans-unit.target: 计算指定日期出现在年中的哪一天。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 through 355 that represents the day of the year specified by the <paramref name="time" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 一个从 1 到 355 的整数，表示 <paramref name="time" /> 参数指定的日期是年中的第几天。

trans-unit.source: The day of the year is defined as the number of days from the first day of the year.
trans-unit.target: 每年的日期被指从该年度的第一天的天数。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.GetDayOfYear%2A> method returns 1 for the first day of the first month of the year, and the total number of days in the year for the last day of the last month.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.GetDayOfYear%2A>方法返回 1 年，和上个月的最后一天的年份中的天的总数的第一个月的第一天。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays the values of several components of a <xref:System.DateTime> in terms of the Um Al Qura calendar.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例显示几个组成部分的值<xref:System.DateTime>方面古兰经历。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="time" /> is outside the range supported by this calendar.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="time" /> 超出了此日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: A year.
trans-unit.target: 年份。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 through 12 that represents a month.
trans-unit.target: 1 到 12 之间的一个整数，用于表示月。

trans-unit.source: An era.
trans-unit.target: 纪元。

trans-unit.source: Specify <see langword="UmAlQuraCalendar.Eras[UmAlQuraCalendar.CurrentEra]" /> or <see cref="F:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.UmAlQuraEra" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see langword="UmAlQuraCalendar.Eras[UmAlQuraCalendar.CurrentEra]" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.UmAlQuraEra" />。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the number of days in the specified month of the specified year and era.
trans-unit.target: 计算指定纪元年份的指定月份中的天数。

trans-unit.source: The number of days in the specified month in the specified year and era.
trans-unit.target: 指定纪元年份中指定月份的天数。

trans-unit.source: The return value is 29 in a common year and 30 in a leap year.
trans-unit.target: 返回值是 29（在平年中）或 30（在闰年中）。

trans-unit.source: This method returns a different number of days in a specified month for a common year versus a leap year.
trans-unit.target: 此方法在指定月份和闰年常见年返回不同数量的天数。

trans-unit.source: For example, this method returns 29 or 30 for Zulhijjah (`month` = 12), depending on whether `year` is a leap year.
trans-unit.target: 例如，此方法为闰年返回 29 或 30 (`month` = 12)，具体取决于`year`是否为闰年。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls the <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.GetDaysInMonth%2A> method to get the number of days in each month of five consecutive years.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例调用<xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.GetDaysInMonth%2A>方法以获取每个月内连续五年的天数。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="year" />, <paramref name="month" />, or <paramref name="era" /> is outside the range supported by the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="year" />、<paramref name="month" /> 或 <paramref name="era" /> 超出了 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar" /> 类支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: A year.
trans-unit.target: 年份。

trans-unit.source: An era.
trans-unit.target: 纪元。

trans-unit.source: Specify <see langword="UmAlQuraCalendar.Eras[UmAlQuraCalendar.CurrentEra]" /> or <see cref="F:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.UmAlQuraEra" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see langword="UmAlQuraCalendar.Eras[UmAlQuraCalendar.CurrentEra]" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.UmAlQuraEra" />。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the number of days in the specified year of the specified era.
trans-unit.target: 计算指定纪元的指定年份中的天数。

trans-unit.source: The number of days in the specified year and era.
trans-unit.target: 指定纪元年份中的天数。

trans-unit.source: The number of days is 354 in a common year or 355 in a leap year.
trans-unit.target: 天数在平年中为 354，在闰年中为 355。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls the <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.GetDaysInYear%2A> method to get the number of days in ten consecutive years in each era supported by the <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar> class.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例调用<xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.GetDaysInYear%2A>方法以获取每十年连续支持的每个纪元中的天数<xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar>类。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="year" /> or <paramref name="era" /> is outside the range supported by the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="year" /> 或 <paramref name="era" /> 超出了 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar" /> 类支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: The date value to read.
trans-unit.target: 要读取的日期值。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the era in which a specified date occurs.
trans-unit.target: 计算指定日期出现在哪个纪元。

trans-unit.source: Always returns the <see cref="F:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.UmAlQuraEra" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 总是返回 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.UmAlQuraEra" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The Um Al Qura calendar recognizes one era: A.H.
trans-unit.target: 古兰经历识别一个纪元： 纪元

trans-unit.source: (Latin "Anno Hegirae", which means "the year of the migration," in reference to the migration of Muhammad (PBUH) from Mecca).
trans-unit.target: (拉丁"Anno Hegirae"，这意味着"year 的迁移后，"关于迁移的穆罕默德 (PBUH) 从麦加迁)。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays the values of several components of a date in the Um Al Qura calendar.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例中古兰经历显示的日期的多个组件的值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="time" /> is outside the range supported by this calendar.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="time" /> 超出了此日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: A year.
trans-unit.target: 年份。

trans-unit.source: An era.
trans-unit.target: 纪元。

trans-unit.source: Specify <see langword="UmAlQuraCalendar.Eras[UmAlQuraCalendar.CurrentEra]" /> or <see cref="F:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.UmAlQuraEra" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see langword="UmAlQuraCalendar.Eras[UmAlQuraCalendar.CurrentEra]" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.UmAlQuraEra" />。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the leap month for a specified year and era.
trans-unit.target: 计算指定纪元年份的闰月。

trans-unit.source: Always 0 because the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar" /> class does not support leap months.
trans-unit.target: 总为 0，因为 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar" /> 类不支持闰月。

trans-unit.source: In a calendar that supports the notion of a leap month, the leap month can occur either after a particular month or after any month in a year.
trans-unit.target: 在日历中支持闰月的概念，在某个特定的月份之后或在每一年中的任何月份之后发生的闰月。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Globalization.EastAsianLunisolarCalendar.GetMonth%28System.DateTime%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method returns a number between 1 and 13 that indicates the month associated with a specified date.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Globalization.EastAsianLunisolarCalendar.GetMonth%28System.DateTime%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法返回一个数字，介于 1 和 13，该值指示指定的日期与关联的月份。

trans-unit.source: If there is a leap month between the eighth and ninth months of the year, the <xref:System.Globalization.EastAsianLunisolarCalendar.GetMonth%2A> method returns 8 for the eighth month, 9 for the leap eighth month, and 10 for the ninth month.
trans-unit.target: 如果一年中，在第八个和第 9 个月之间存在闰月<xref:System.Globalization.EastAsianLunisolarCalendar.GetMonth%2A>方法闰第八个月的 9 和 10 第 9 个月的第八个月份返回 8。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="year" /> is less than 1318 or greater than 1450.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="year" /> 小于 1318 或大于 1450。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="era" /> is not <see langword="UmAlQuraCalendar.Eras[UmAlQuraCalendar.CurrentEra]" /> or <see cref="F:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.UmAlQuraEra" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="era" /> 不是 <see langword="UmAlQuraCalendar.Eras[UmAlQuraCalendar.CurrentEra]" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.UmAlQuraEra" />。

trans-unit.source: The date value to read.
trans-unit.target: 要读取的日期值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar" /> class supports only dates from 04/30/1900 00.00.00 (Gregorian date) through 11/16/2077 23:59:59 (Gregorian date).
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar" /> 类仅支持从 04/30/1900 00.00.00（公历日期）到 11/16/2077 23:59:59（公历日期）的日期。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the month in which a specified date occurs.
trans-unit.target: 计算指定日期出现在哪个月份中。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 through 12 that represents the month in the date specified by the <paramref name="time" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 一个从 1 到 12 的整数，表示 <paramref name="time" /> 参数指定的日期中的月份。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays the date ranges supported by the <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar> class in both the Gregorian and Um Al Qura calendars.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例显示支持的日期范围<xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar>公历和 Um Al Qura 日历中的类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.GetMonth%2A> method is used to retrieve the month of the minimum and maximum supported dates in the Um Al Qura calendar if it is not the current culture's current calendar.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.GetMonth%2A>方法用于检索古兰经历中的最小和最大支持日期的月份，如果它不是当前区域性的当前日历。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="time" /> is outside the range supported by this calendar.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="time" /> 超出了此日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: A year.
trans-unit.target: 年份。

trans-unit.source: An era.
trans-unit.target: 纪元。

trans-unit.source: Specify <see langword="UmAlQuaraCalendar.Eras[UmAlQuraCalendar.CurrentEra]" /> or <see cref="F:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.UmAlQuraEra" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see langword="UmAlQuaraCalendar.Eras[UmAlQuraCalendar.CurrentEra]" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.UmAlQuraEra" />。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the number of months in the specified year of the specified era.
trans-unit.target: 计算指定纪元的指定年份中的月数。

trans-unit.source: Always 12.
trans-unit.target: 始终为 12。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls the <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.GetMonthsInYear%2A> method to determine the number of months in four consecutive years, and then calls the <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.GetDaysInMonth%2A> method to determine how many days there are in each month.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例调用<xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.GetMonthsInYear%2A>方法来确定连续为四年，并随后将调用中的月数<xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.GetDaysInMonth%2A>方法以确定有多少天处于每个月。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="year" /> is outside the range supported by this calendar.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="year" /> 超出了此日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="era" /> is outside the range supported by this calendar.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="era" /> 超出了此日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: The date value to read.
trans-unit.target: 要读取的日期值。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar" /> class supports only dates from 04/30/1900 00.00.00 (Gregorian date) through 11/16/2077 23:59:59 (Gregorian date).
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar" /> 类仅支持从 04/30/1900 00.00.00（公历日期）到 11/16/2077 23:59:59（公历日期）的日期。

trans-unit.source: Calculates the year of a date represented by a specified <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />.
trans-unit.target: 计算由指定 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 表示的日期所在的年份。

trans-unit.source: An integer that represents the year specified by the <paramref name="time" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 一个整数，表示由 <paramref name="time" /> 参数指定的年份。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays the date ranges supported by the <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar> class in both the Gregorian and Um Al Qura calendars.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例显示支持的日期范围<xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar>公历和 Um Al Qura 日历中的类。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.GetYear%2A> method is used to retrieve the year of the minimum and maximum supported dates in the Um Al Qura calendar if it is not the current culture's current calendar.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.GetYear%2A>方法用于检索古兰经历中的最小和最大支持日期的年份，如果它不是当前区域性的当前日历。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="time" /> is outside the range supported by this calendar.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="time" /> 超出了此日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: A year.
trans-unit.target: 年份。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 through 12 that represents a month.
trans-unit.target: 1 到 12 之间的一个整数，用于表示月。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 through 30 that represents a day.
trans-unit.target: 1 到 30 之间的一个整数，用于表示日。

trans-unit.source: An era.
trans-unit.target: 纪元。

trans-unit.source: Specify <see langword="UmAlQuraCalendar.Eras[UmAlQuraCalendar.CurrentEra]" /> or <see cref="F:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.UmAlQuraEra" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see langword="UmAlQuraCalendar.Eras[UmAlQuraCalendar.CurrentEra]" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.UmAlQuraEra" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified date is a leap day.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的日期是否为闰日。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified day is a leap day; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的日期是闰日，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The return value is always <see langword="false" /> because the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar" /> class does not support leap days.
trans-unit.target: 返回值始终为 <see langword="false" /> 因为 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar" /> 类不支持闰日。

trans-unit.source: A leap day is a day that occurs only in a leap year.
trans-unit.target: 闰日是仅在闰年中发生了一天。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls the <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.IsLeapDay%2A> method for the last day of the second month (February) for five years in each of the eras.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例调用<xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.IsLeapDay%2A>五年中每个纪元的第二个月份 （年 2 月） 的最后一天的方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="year" />, <paramref name="month" />, <paramref name="day" />, or <paramref name="era" /> is outside the range supported by the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="year" />、<paramref name="month" />、<paramref name="day" /> 或 <paramref name="era" /> 超出了 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar" /> 类支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: A year.
trans-unit.target: 年份。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 through 12 that represents a month.
trans-unit.target: 1 到 12 之间的一个整数，用于表示月。

trans-unit.source: An era.
trans-unit.target: 纪元。

trans-unit.source: Specify <see langword="UmAlQuraCalendar.Eras[UmAlQuraCalendar.CurrentEra]" /> or <see cref="F:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.UmAlQuraEra" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see langword="UmAlQuraCalendar.Eras[UmAlQuraCalendar.CurrentEra]" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.UmAlQuraEra" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified month in the specified year and era is a leap month.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定纪元年份中的指定月份是否为闰月。

trans-unit.source: Always <see langword="false" /> because the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar" /> class does not support leap months.
trans-unit.target: 总为 <see langword="false" />，因为 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar" /> 类不支持闰月。

trans-unit.source: A leap month is an entire month that occurs only in a leap year.
trans-unit.target: 闰月是仅在闰年中发生的整月。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="year" />, <paramref name="month" />, or <paramref name="era" /> is outside the range supported by the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="year" />、<paramref name="month" /> 或 <paramref name="era" /> 超出了 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar" /> 类支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: A year.
trans-unit.target: 年份。

trans-unit.source: An era.
trans-unit.target: 纪元。

trans-unit.source: Specify <see langword="UmAlQuraCalendar.Eras[UmAlQuraCalendar.CurrentEra]" /> or <see cref="F:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.UmAlQuraEra" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see langword="UmAlQuraCalendar.Eras[UmAlQuraCalendar.CurrentEra]" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.UmAlQuraEra" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified year in the specified era is a leap year.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定纪元中的指定年份是否为闰年。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the specified year is a leap year; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果指定的年是闰年，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: A common year has 354 days and a leap year has 355 days.
trans-unit.target: 平年有 354 天，闰年有 355 天。

trans-unit.source: The following example lists the number of days in ten consecutive years and calls the <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.IsLeapYear%2A> method to determine which years are leap years.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例列出的 10 个连续年和调用中的天数<xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.IsLeapYear%2A>方法来确定哪些年是闰年。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="year" /> or <paramref name="era" /> is outside the range supported by the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="year" /> 或 <paramref name="era" /> 超出了 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar" /> 类支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: Gets the latest date and time supported by this calendar.
trans-unit.target: 获取此日历支持的最晚日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: The latest date and time supported by the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar" /> class, which is equivalent to the last moment of November 16, 2077 C.E.
trans-unit.target: 最新的日期和时间受<see cref="T:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar" />类，这等同于的公元 2077 年 11 月 16，那一刻

trans-unit.source: in the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 在公历日历中。

trans-unit.source: Starting with the [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)], the value of the <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.MaxSupportedDateTime%2A> property is 11/16/2077.
trans-unit.target: 从开始[!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/includes/net-v45-md.md)]的值<xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.MaxSupportedDateTime%2A>属性是 11/16/2077。

trans-unit.source: In previous versions of the .NET Framework, its value is the last moment of May 13, 2029 C.E.
trans-unit.target: 在以前版本的.NET Framework，其值都 2029 年 5 月 13 日公元的那一刻

trans-unit.source: in the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 在公历日历中。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays the date ranges supported by the <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar> class in both the Gregorian and Um Al Qura calendars.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例显示支持的日期范围<xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar>公历和 Um Al Qura 日历中的类。

trans-unit.source: Gets the earliest date and time supported by this calendar.
trans-unit.target: 获取此日历支持的最早日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: The earliest date and time supported by the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar" /> class, which is equivalent to the first moment of April 30, 1900 C.E.
trans-unit.target: 最早的日期和时间受<see cref="T:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar" />类，该类是等效的公元 1900 年 4 月 30 日那一刻到

trans-unit.source: in the Gregorian calendar.
trans-unit.target: 在公历日历中。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays the date ranges supported by the <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar> class in both the Gregorian and Um Al Qura calendars.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例显示支持的日期范围<xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar>公历和 Um Al Qura 日历中的类。

trans-unit.source: A year.
trans-unit.target: 年份。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 through 12 that represents a month.
trans-unit.target: 1 到 12 之间的一个整数，用于表示月。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 1 through 29 that represents a day.
trans-unit.target: 1 到 29 之间的一个整数，用于表示日。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 0 through 23 that represents an hour.
trans-unit.target: 0 到 23 之间的一个整数，用于表示小时。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 0 through 59 that represents a minute.
trans-unit.target: 0 到 59 之间的一个整数，用于表示分钟。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 0 through 59 that represents a second.
trans-unit.target: 0 到 59 之间的一个整数，用于表示秒。

trans-unit.source: An integer from 0 through 999 that represents a millisecond.
trans-unit.target: 0 到 999 之间的一个整数，用于表示毫秒。

trans-unit.source: An era.
trans-unit.target: 纪元。

trans-unit.source: Specify <see langword="UmAlQuraCalendar.Eras[UmAlQuraCalendar.CurrentEra]" /> or <see cref="F:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.UmAlQuraEra" />.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see langword="UmAlQuraCalendar.Eras[UmAlQuraCalendar.CurrentEra]" /> 或 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.UmAlQuraEra" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that is set to the specified date, time, and era.
trans-unit.target: 返回设置为指定的日期、时间和纪元的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> that is set to the specified date and time in the current era.
trans-unit.target: 设置为当前纪元中指定日期和时间的 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.ToDateTime%2A> method is useful because it can convert any date in the current calendar to a Gregorian calendar date.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.ToDateTime%2A>方法很有用，因为它可以将当前日历中的任何日期转换为公历日期。

trans-unit.source: The Gregorian date can subsequently be used, for example, to compare dates in different calendars or create an equivalent date in a particular calendar.
trans-unit.target: 公历日期可以随后用于，例如，比较不同日历中的日期或在特定日历中创建等效的日期。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="year" />, <paramref name="month" />, <paramref name="day" />, or <paramref name="era" /> is outside the range supported by the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar" /> class.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="year" />、<paramref name="month" />、<paramref name="day" /> 或 <paramref name="era" /> 超出了 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar" /> 类支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="hour" /> is less than zero or greater than 23.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="hour" /> 小于 0 或大于 23。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="minute" /> is less than zero or greater than 59.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="minute" /> 小于 0 或大于 59。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="second" /> is less than zero or greater than 59.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="second" /> 小于 0 或大于 59。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="millisecond" /> is less than zero or greater than 999.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="millisecond" /> 小于 0 或大于 999。

trans-unit.source: A 2-digit year from 0 through 99, or a 4-digit Um Al Qura calendar year from 1318 through 1450.
trans-unit.target: 一个从 0 到 99 的两位数年份，或一个从 1318 到 1450 的四位数 Um Al Qura 日历年份。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified year to a four-digit year by using the <see cref="P:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.TwoDigitYearMax" /> property to determine the appropriate century.
trans-unit.target: 使用 <see cref="P:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.TwoDigitYearMax" /> 属性将指定的年份转换为四位数年份，以确定相应的纪元。

trans-unit.source: If the <paramref name="year" /> parameter is a 2-digit year, the return value is the corresponding 4-digit year.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="year" /> 参数是两位数年份，则返回值是对应的四位数年份。

trans-unit.source: If the <paramref name="year" /> parameter is a 4-digit year, the return value is the unchanged <paramref name="year" /> parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="year" /> 参数是四位数年份，则返回值是未更改的 <paramref name="year" /> 参数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.ToFourDigitYear%2A> method uses the `year` parameter, the <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A> property, and a year to calculate a 4-digit year.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.ToFourDigitYear%2A>方法使用`year`参数，<xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A>属性，并且要计算的 4 位数年份年份。

trans-unit.source: The century is determined by finding the sole occurrence of the 2-digit `year` parameter within that 100-year range.
trans-unit.target: 通过查找 2 位数字的唯一匹配项来确定世纪`year`该 100 年范围内的参数。

trans-unit.source: For example, if <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A> is set to 1429, the 100-year range is from 1330 through 1429.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果<xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A>设置为 1429 中的 100 年范围是从 1330 至 1429年。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 1330, while a 2-digit value of 29 is interpreted as 1429.
trans-unit.target: 因此，为 30 的 2 位值被解释为 1330，而 29 一个 2 位数字值被解释为 1429年。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A> property is the special value 99, the <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.ToFourDigitYear%2A> method ignores the settings in the regional and language options in Control Panel and returns the `year` parameter unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A>属性是特殊值 99，<xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.ToFourDigitYear%2A>方法将忽略区域中的设置和语言选项控制面板中，并返回`year`参数保持不变。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.ToFourDigitYear%2A> supports either a two-digit year or a four-digit year.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.ToFourDigitYear%2A> 支持两位数年份或四位数年份。

trans-unit.source: Passing a two-digit year value (less than 100) causes the method to convert the value to a four-digit value according to the <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A> value representing the appropriate century.
trans-unit.target: 将两位数年份值 (小于 100) 传递会导致方法的值转换为一个四位数字值根据<xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A>值，该值表示相应的纪元。

trans-unit.source: If the application supplies a four-digit year value that is within the supported calendar range to <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.ToFourDigitYear%2A>, the method returns the actual input value.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用程序提供在支持的日历范围到内的四位数年份值<xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.ToFourDigitYear%2A>，该方法返回实际的输入的值。

trans-unit.source: If the application supplies a four-digit value that is outside the supported calendar range, or if it supplies a negative value, the method throws an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果应用程序提供一个四位数字值超出了支持的日历，或者它提供了负值，则该方法将引发异常。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="year" /> is outside the range supported by this calendar.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="year" /> 超出了此日历支持的范围。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置可以用两位数年份表示的 100 年范围内的最后一年。

trans-unit.source: The last year of a 100-year range that can be represented by a 2-digit year.
trans-unit.target: 可以用两位数年份表示的 100 年范围内的最后一年。

trans-unit.source: This property allows a 2-digit year to be properly translated to a 4-digit year.
trans-unit.target: 此属性允许两位数年份，要正确转换为 4 位数年份。

trans-unit.source: For example, if this property is set to 1429, the 100-year range is from 1330 through 1429.
trans-unit.target: 例如，如果此属性设置为 1429年，则 100 年范围是从 1330 至 1429年。

trans-unit.source: Therefore, a 2-digit value of 30 is interpreted as 1330, while a 2-digit value of 29 is interpreted as 1429.
trans-unit.target: 因此，为 30 的 2 位值被解释为 1330，而 29 一个 2 位数字值被解释为 1429年。

trans-unit.source: The initial value of this property is derived from the settings in the regional and language options portion of Control Panel.
trans-unit.target: 此属性的初始值被派生自控制面板的区域和语言选项部分中的设置。

trans-unit.source: However, that information can change during the life of the <xref:System.AppDomain>.
trans-unit.target: 但是，该信息可以更改的生命周期内<xref:System.AppDomain>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar> class does not detect changes in the system settings automatically.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar>类不会检测系统设置中的更改自动。

trans-unit.source: The special value 99 causes the <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.ToFourDigitYear%2A> method to ignore the system settings and return the specified year unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 这两个特殊值 99 使<xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.ToFourDigitYear%2A>方法以忽略系统设置并返回指定的年保持不变。

trans-unit.source: This calendar is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此日历为只读。

trans-unit.source: In a set operation, the Um Al Qura calendar year value is less than 1318 but not 99, or is greater than 1450.
trans-unit.target: 在设置操作中，Um Al Qura 年份值小于 1318 而不是 99，或者大于 1450。

trans-unit.source: Represents the current era.
trans-unit.target: 表示当前纪元。

trans-unit.source: This field is constant.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为常数。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.UmAlQuraEra> field is 1.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar.UmAlQuraEra>字段为 1。

trans-unit.source: The Um Al Qura calendar recognizes one era: A.H.
trans-unit.target: 古兰经历识别一个纪元： 纪元

trans-unit.source: (Latin "Anno Hegirae", which means "the year of the migration," in reference to the migration of Muhammad (PBUH) from Mecca).
trans-unit.target: (拉丁"Anno Hegirae"，这意味着"year 的迁移后，"关于迁移的穆罕默德 (PBUH) 从麦加迁)。
